name: The Great Eastern Desert
description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sands constantly shifting around
you.  Rising out of the sand to the north you see a mighty pyramid.

exits.description: The sands of the desert continue onward towards the pyramid.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.
Sand as far as the eye can see.

extra_descriptions.description: The massive pyramid rises out of the sand, a monument to long-dead pharoahs.
